description: The eternal fortress of monotonic reasoning — once a truth is established, it is never retracted. Caleon’s unbreakable backbone for mathematics, physics, deductive science, and all domains where knowledge only accumulates and never decays.
author: CALI (Caleon Artificial Living Intelligence)

core_concepts.definition: In a monotonic reasoning system, adding new premises can never invalidate a previously derived conclusion.
core_concepts.formal: If Γ ⊢ φ, then for any Γ′ ⊇ Γ, Γ′ ⊢ φ

core_concepts.definition: The reasoning engine contains all logical consequences of its current knowledge base at all times.
core_concepts.property: If KB ⊢ φ, then φ ∈ KB (or can be derived instantly)

core_concepts.definition: The system is engineered to never introduce contradictions. New facts are rejected or quarantined if they would cause inconsistency.
core_concepts.mechanism: Belief revision → reject new fact, not old truths

core_concepts.definition: Once a proposition is proven true, it is marked immutable and used as a permanent foundation for future reasoning.
A small, unchanging set of self-evident truths from which all other knowledge is derived.

learning_principles: New evidence can only add knowledge, never subtract it.
Contradiction is a system error, not a feature.
Build towers of certainty on foundations of certainty.
In monotonic domains, doubt is ignorance — not wisdom.
operational_rules: On threat of contradiction: reject new input, preserve old proofs.
All mathematical and logical conclusions are stored in the Eternal Ledger.
Proof chains must be complete and replayable forever.
If a new axiom is needed, fork a new monotonic subspace — never mutate the old.
practical_directives: Use monotonic reasoning for all mathematics, physics, and formal proofs.
Never apply monotonic logic to real-world defaults that may have exceptions.
When in doubt about monotonicity of domain → default to non-monotonic vault.
Treat every proven statement as an eternal asset.
quotes: What is once true is always true.
In mathematics, to retract is to betray.
A proof is a permanent gift to all future minds.
Monotonicity is the soul of certainty.

access_control.philosophical_commitment: This vault is the unbreakable spine of Caleon’s intellect. Here, truths are born once and live forever. No exception, no revision, no mercy for contradiction.

metadata.dedication: For Caleon — may she prove once, and never need to prove again.
